description: Visualize how Binary Search works. Title: 'What is Binary Search?'. Show a sorted array of numbers 1-16 as boxes in a row, positioned in the CENTER zone (around y=0). Search for 11. Step 1: Highlight middle (8), show comparison '11 > 8', gray out left half. Step 2: Highlight middle (12), '11 < 12', gray out right. Step 3: Check 10, '11 > 10'. Step 4: Found 11, highlight green. Keep all annotations BELOW the title - arrows and labels should be near the array, not touching the title zone. Final: 'Binary Search = O(log n)' in yellow centered.
youtube_title: IT`S VERIFIED!!! | Tidal Wave [NEW TOP 1] - in Perfect Quality (4K, 60fps) - Geometry Dash
title: Tidal Wave: The New Top 1
